name: immeasurably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is so large or great that it cannot be measured or known exactly: The damage from the 1956 hurricane was immeasurably greater. My appreciation for Lincoln has grown immeasurably. See
immeasurable
More examplesFewer examplesI know life is about to change immeasurably.She suffers from heart problems and this is an immeasurably difficult time for her.Thousands of patients' lives have been made immeasurably better by the application of cloning genes.
